definition: to drag/to pull/to raise a child (through difficulties)/to help/to support/to drag in/to chat
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to pull/to tear/(of cloth, thread etc) to buy/to chat/to gossip/(coll.) (Tw) ridiculous/hokey
to tug at/to pull at sb aggressively/to take sb's hand or arm in a too familiar way/(derog.) to hobnob/to consort

sentences.english: It yanks you out of your body and your mind and throws you against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 它把你從肉體和思想中拉扯出來並拋向牆壁。

sentences.english: The cotton material are ventilates, moisture-absorbing and perspiration, resistant to pull and drag.
sentences.chinese: 布料通風透氣且吸溼排汗，耐拉扯。

sentences.english: How should solve family and soulful dispute drag again?
sentences.chinese: 又該如何解決家庭與感情上的糾葛拉扯？

sentences.english: It was hard for a single man to bring up children alone.
sentences.chinese: 對一位單身男子來說，要把孩子們拉扯大真不容易。

sentences.english: When used force pull audio cable, headset may damage.
sentences.chinese: 運用時，用力拉扯音頻線，能夠招致耳機保護。

sentences.english: Whirlpools and eddies can pull divers downwards.
sentences.chinese: 漩渦能將潛水者往下方拉扯。

sentences.english: No entwine pulling simply won't care who concern himself.
sentences.chinese: 沒有糾纏拉扯只是簡單的過沒人關注自己不關注誰。

sentences.english: The child is pulling his mother's coat.
sentences.chinese: 孩子拉扯着他媽的外衣。

sentences.english: It was quite a job for her to bring up several children all by herself during the war …
sentences.chinese: 在戰爭年代，她一個人拉扯好幾個孩子，真難爲她了。

sentences.english: The confrontation then degenerated into a bout of hair pulling.
sentences.chinese: 對質演變成了拉扯頭髮。

sentences.english: The widowed mother reared up the two children.
sentences.chinese: 寡母把兩個孩子拉扯大了。

sentences.english: Ding Hai to see two people pull on Tianlong fists.
sentences.chinese: 丁海見二人拉扯，對天朗揮拳相向。

sentences.english: His splayed hand pulled at his crotch as if emasculation would be sweet to him.
sentences.chinese: 張開的手掌拉扯着他的胯部，好像閹割也是種快感。

sentences.english: It wasn't at all easy for your mother to bring you up.
sentences.chinese: 你媽把你拉扯到這麼大可真不容易啊。

sentences.english: No entwine pulling simply won't care who concern himimmolation.
sentences.chinese: 沒有糾纏拉扯只是簡單的過沒人關注自己不關注誰。

sentences.english: It was almost as if I was a taut rope in a tug-of-war being pulled in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 我如同在拔河比賽中被兩頭拉扯的繩子，左右爲難。
